clinical_study.brief_title: A Single-Dose, Open-Label, Randomized, Food Effect and Blinded, Randomized, Dose Proportionality Study in Healthy Volunteers With Bardoxolone Methyl
clinical_study.official_title: A Single-Dose, Open-Label, Randomized, Food Effect and Blinded, Randomized, Dose Proportionality Study in Healthy Volunteers With Bardoxolone Methyl

brief_summary.textblock: This study is to determine the effect of food on a single dose of 20 mg bardoxolone methyl administered to normal healthy adult subjects.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.measure: Effect of food on Pharmacokinetics of a 20 mg single dose of bardoxolone methyl

secondary_outcome.measure: Dose proportionality of 20mg, 60mg, and 80mg bardoxolone methyl
